column4: arghhhh. dpkg-buildpackage complains that you need to run it with fakeroot after completing the build. sucky if you're building X :)
running fakeroot debian/rules binary will probably pickup the build
i think there may be a way with dpkg-buildpackage as well, but i'm eating so someone else can look it up ;)
too late, i accidentally ran a fakeroot dpkg-buildpackage after it, and first thing it does is whack the build tree :)
